errors.cantGenerateThumbnails: We couldn't automatically generate the thumbnails - Please manually upload at least 1 thumbnail

upload.tagsPlaceholder: Max 30 tags - Hit 'enter' after every tag
upload.downloadLinkInstructionsLabel: Download instructions (for example in case the file is protected with a password, specify it here)
upload.modelDescription: Specify the name of the model that appears on the video. If more than one model appears, you can specify other models as tags
upload.disclaimer: New videos can take up to 1 hour to show up on main page and search results
upload.editDisclaimer: Video modifications can take up to 1 hour to be applied on main page and search results
